Name: Shabti fragment
Description: A fragment of a shabti belonging to Amenirdis, a 'God's Wife of Amun' and sister of Shabaka, pharaoh of the 25th Dynasty. The shabti is made from a highly polished serpentine, the torso is well defined and modelled. The hands and ends of the lappet wig are delicate. Three horizontal bands of finely incised text remain.
